documents.document:
begining

Life is suffering, I try to find out the fun. The begining maybe means something new from now on. I am eager to find a new way to continue my life. The weather is strange in this season in Chengdu. It's cloudy on the morning, rains at noon and a shining sunshine in the afternoon. Someone says it is the weather of the earthquake, so many bad news are around us, we can do nothing but forget them by enjoying those wonderful things.

[
photo]29574334[/photo]

study

I dreamed to learn in a foreign country to get my master degree in hospital management. But I failed to get admission of an English university. I don't know what I should do. To wait? or try another one? I don't know.
There are two videos, one is about a lady and the other is about a small boy, their voices touched me too much.

http://www.leeds.ac.uk/lihs/nuffield/index.htm

http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XODY0NDg4MDg=.html

summer flower

it rains every night in this summer. "It's really like something bad will happen" someone said. Personally, I love this kind of weather. I love rain very much, especially the eve of the storm. The sky is dark, leaves of the tree are swing just like struggle to flee from the control of the big wind. But it is no good for the crops, I worry about at the end of this year if we can gain for the enough food and vegetable.
Anyhow, there is still something let me feel good as follows. I planted this flower for two years. Every summer it will devote the elegant flower to me . It is common in Chengdu, and many places of the south in China.

relaxation

a friend told me:"I f you feel frustration or in depression. You just do everything you like even it is boresome, you must do it without distraction. " I tried. He is right, I feel better when I play a simple game on the computer and nothing can let me distracted. The feeling is great. I think we need relaxation, but sometime I forgot.

admiring

A friend of mine has gone to U.S as a visiting scholar. I admire her. To learn in a foreign country is my dream. I love to learn a different language, I love to live in a foreign country for a few months to know a different culture deeply, it is interesting. I am not sure if I have such oppotunity to fulfil my dream. I will put my enffort to make it become true.

lost beauty

I planted a kind of flower. it is common in Yunnan province and Xichang city of Sichuan province. It loves to live in the place which is full of sunshine. All my family love it very much. But it was stolen. I miss it , I miss that wonderful summer with its beautiful flowers and leaves.

entrance of the university

Today is important, because it is the day for choosing a university for my nephew. He is a good boy. But his mark is not good as I expected. Anyway, he can enter a university. The entrance examination for university is the most important thing in China. We passed and felt good. My nephew can enter the unitversity which he likes. The last thing is waiting for the letter of admission of the university. Good luck and good luck for me, at the end of the July, I also can know my result of the examination of CATTI.

The book named the life with wisdom



I finished this book today. The writer is a lady in 96. she is good at the chinese traditional culture. In this book, she shares her experiences of the life with us. And she introduces the Ru, Shi and Taoism to us with simple words. She tell the truth that the person who loves reading will never lonely. I love this book.I do hope I can lead such kind of life with wisdom.

I want to be a bird

Today is a long day, I have my lessons for ten hours, from 8:30 am to 7:00 pm, only have a break for one hour to eat lunch. I am exausted when I walked out of the classroom. I looked up to the sky, suddenly I hope I could be a bird. At the same time I miss those happy days on the road.







took on June,2009. in the swan lake----Bayinbuluke of Xin Jiang province,





took on June,2009 in Hemu village of Xinjiang province. the most beautiful village and the back gardon of the God.

when I am dead

Today I have my lessons for a whole day long. But I don't know why there are some lines of the poem of when I m dead, my dearest appear in my brain. I loved this poem few years ago. Christina Georgina Rossetti was my favorit poet. Tonight I read this poem again and come back those days in campus.

When I am Dead,My Dearest¬——by Christina Georgina Rossetti
When I am dead,my dearest,
Sing no sad songs for me;
Plant thou no roses at my head,
Nor shady cypress tree:
Be the green grass above me
With showers and dewdrops wet,
And if thou wilt, remember,
And if thou wilt, forget.

I shall not see the shadows,
I shall not feel the rain;
I shall not hear the nightingale
Sing on, as if in pain:
And dreaming through the twilight
That doth not rise nor set,
Haply I may remember,
And haply may forget.

fly in the art world

I am so happy nowaday, something traped me I have given it up. Now , I just like a bird fly freely in the art world, literature, paintings, dance,music, chinese opera, even singing, all the beauties of the life comes back, I tare off all the pretendence to be real myself. This is what I really want.
